meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.1 ::date 2012-12-10T10:28:42 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt One of the hypotheses states : a long time ago , in order to hide from wild beasts roaming on the land , humans had ever lived in shallow water regions for a long period of time , surviving on aquatic plants and fishes . # ::save-date Thu Jun 4, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_1.txt
sentence: One of the hypotheses states : a long time ago , in order to hide from wild beasts roaming on the land , humans had ever lived in shallow water regions for a long period of time , surviving on aquatic plants and fishes .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.2 ::date 2012-12-10T11:16:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Therefore , the body hairs , which increased the friction in water , had fallen off . # ::save-date Sun Jul 26, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_2.txt
sentence: Therefore , the body hairs , which increased the friction in water , had fallen off .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.3 ::date 2012-12-10T11:17:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The reason for this explanation is that the fine hairs on the back of humans run from one side of the shoulder toward the spine , a different direction from that of monkeys . # ::save-date Sun Jul 26, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_3.txt
sentence: The reason for this explanation is that the fine hairs on the back of humans run from one side of the shoulder toward the spine , a different direction from that of monkeys .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.4 ::date 2012-12-10T13:38:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Only such a direction could reduce the friction in water , and provide more buoyancy for the person who is swimming in the water . # ::save-date Tue Jun 9, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_4.txt
sentence: Only such a direction could reduce the friction in water , and provide more buoyancy for the person who is swimming in the water .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.5 ::date 2012-12-10T13:38:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt However , in all the primitive gathering settlements that have been discovered so far , we have not seen any settlement where people lived in such a way . # ::save-date Tue Jul 28, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_5.txt
sentence: However , in all the primitive gathering settlements that have been discovered so far , we have not seen any settlement where people lived in such a way .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.6 ::date 2012-12-10T12:27:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt What is worse is -- from the perspective of the direction of the fine hairs as well -- the fine hairs on humans ' upper arm point downward , while the fine hairs on the lower arm point upward , which is to say , they all run toward the elbow . # ::save-date Mon Nov 13, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_6.txt
sentence: What is worse is -- from the perspective of the direction of the fine hairs as well -- the fine hairs on humans ' upper arm point downward , while the fine hairs on the lower arm point upward , which is to say , they all run toward the elbow .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0006.7 ::date 2012-12-10T18:45:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt This is somewhat similar to monkeys who have hairs : when it rains , they would hold their heads with their hands , and such a direction of their hairs would be easier for the rain to flow away along their elbows # ::save-date Thu Oct 26, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0006_7.txt
sentence: This is somewhat similar to monkeys who have hairs : when it rains , they would hold their heads with their hands , and such a direction of their hairs would be easier for the rain to flow away along their elbows
